short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension fills up the form automatically by fetching its value from the CADASHBOARD.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension aims for auto filling of password and username details on a few selected sites. We have a feature called Vault here  https://www.cadashboard.com/, where a user can click on the website where he wants to fill his username and password. This extension canâ€™t be accessed from any other website.
